feed.title: North Mountain (Cape Breton) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , North Mountain (Cape Breton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 09:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: -9.4°C
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -10.4°C
Wind: WSW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. High minus 1. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
